member.summary: Gets or sets the readable name for the synthetic traffic source. If not provided, defaults to the pattern match.

member.name: T:Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Web.OperationNameTelemetryInitializer
member.summary: A telemetry initializer that will set the NAME property of OperationContext corresponding to a TraceTelemetry object.
